definition: to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)

sentences.english: If you carry on , ond day something good will happen .
sentences.chinese: 如果你坚持下去，总有一天会有好事情发生。

sentences.english: Zhang Xiaoxiao also strengthened the conviction stick.
sentences.chinese: 也坚定了张筱筱坚持下去的信念。

sentences.english: You're making progress. Keep it up.
sentences.chinese: 你正在取得进步，坚持下去。

sentences.english: Even if it is difficult to learn a language, but I always stick to it.
sentences.chinese: 即使它是一门很难学懂的语言，但我始终会坚持下去。

sentences.english: The basic principles for learning from experiments are familiar; stick to them.
sentences.chinese: 从实验中学习这一基本原则大家都很熟悉，坚持下去。

sentences.english: Bush has resisted that so far--and may continue to resist.
sentences.chinese: 布什坚持了这么久，还可能继续坚持下去。

sentences.english: but I think my advice would be just to keep on trying, really.
sentences.chinese: 但是我想我的办法是坚持下去，真的。

sentences.english: Loyalty should be judged in an overall situation, so it is stupid to remain in a less ideal environment.
sentences.chinese: 忠诚需要大环境，如果环境不好坚持下去就是愚忠。

sentences.english: Stick with it Douglas. Your fortitude is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯坚持下去，你的坚忍不拔是我们大家的榜样。

sentences.english: We will insist on all the policies favorable to opening up.
sentences.chinese: 一切有利于对外开放的政策，我们都会坚持下去。

sentences.english: If you are struggling with this technique, then persevere.
sentences.chinese: 如果你正在尝试这种方法，那么坚持下去。

sentences.english: Start with smaller jumps at first, but do it consistently enough that you don't lose your reflexes.
sentences.chinese: 从小事开始，一以贯之的坚持下去，保持灵敏的反应。

sentences.english: But my determination to continue building the beloved community continues always.
sentences.chinese: 不过我建设心爱的修行团体的决定一直坚持下去。

sentences.english: He cut his finger, but bravely soldiered on and finished the job.
sentences.chinese: 他割破了手指，但仍然勇敢地坚持下去，完成了工作。

sentences.english: Watching you gradually tone-up and progress in here has become my primary inspiration to get in shape.
sentences.chinese: 看着你的毅力和进步已经成为我坚持下去的最大动力。

sentences.english: Yes, it's not easy to soldier on.
sentences.chinese: 当然，坚持下去是十分困难的。

definition: to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished
to pay/to invest (energy or time in a friendship etc)
